description: Non-material amendment to 20/03448/FUL to allow wording of conditions 7 and 27 to be revised to 'No construction works on top of the roof shall commence until..' with wording for conditions 18, 21 and 30 to be revised to 'Prior to the commencement of both hard and soft landscaping works..' and wording for condition 28 to be revised to 'The development shall be completed in accordance with the energy statement: Amendment to Approved Energy and Sustainability Strategy by Watkins Payne dated 21st January 2025'.
